snippet: Chinese authorities have turned off the water supply to a district in the northwestern city of Lanzhou after excessive levels of a toxic chemical were found in tap water.
abstract: Chinese authorities turn off the water supply to a district in the northwestern city of Lanzhou after excessive levels of a toxic chemical are found in tap water.
lead_paragraph: Chinese authorities have turned off the water supply to a district in the northwestern city of Lanzhou after excessive levels of a toxic chemical were found in tap water.

headline.main: China: Chemical Found in City’s Water
headline.print_headline: China: Chemical Found in City’s Water
